text: Alfons Brehm (16 July 1882 - 7 December 1968) was a German field hockey player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1882 births Category:1968 deaths Category:German male field hockey players Category:Olympic field hockey players of Germany Category:Field hockey players at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hamburg
title: Alfons Brehm
